article:
Bob and Mike are good friends. They are in the same school, _ in different classes. Their favorite _ is Chinese. They think it is very _ . They go to school on weekdays. They come to school at 8:00 in the morning. Today is Thursday. Bob and Mike are having classes in their classrooms.
Now Bob is _ an English class. He is speaking English with his English teacher Miss Sun. She thinks Bob speaks English very _ . Mike is having a Chinese class. _ teacher is talking about Beijing Opera with the students. He is looking at the teacher and listening carefully.
Their last class is at 4 o'clock. After class they go to the playground to do sports. Bob usually _ in the playground and he is good at running. Mike likes playing basketball with his other _ . But he sometimes watches Bob run there. After doing sports, they usually go home together* because Bob's house is near Mike's house.
